item.title: AWS Automated Remediation - Part 1: Security Groups
item.description: Prelude This is going to be the first in many auto-remediation blog posts! Each one will append more and more to our SAM template. Iâ€™m planning on making this a multi-part series where we develop a fully customized system to automatically remediating high risk findings. It sure is annoying having to revoke open security groups. You have to log into the console, navigate to EC2, find the violation, and remove the open ingress port and CIDR range.
